name: MediaAppAsset
desc: The asset details of app preview or app screenshots.

items.name: assetGenId
items.desc: The unique identifier for the app preview or screenshot.Your adamId is the first numerical grouping in assetGenId. For example, in 1408851466;en-US;5;0;f8c9add6280c781e6f701c506be5a921, 1408851466 is your adamId.

items.name: assetType
items.desc: The type of creative asset. App previews are still images of video assets that you upload to App Store Connect. Note, the playable URL isnâ€™t in the API response. A screenshot is a standard image of the app that you upload to App Store Connect.

items.name: assetURL
items.desc: The resolved URL for the screenshot or a screenshot of the video asset.

items.name: orientation
items.desc: The orientation of the asset that you upload to App Store Connect.
